name: A prosperous Africa based on inclusive growth and sustainable development
description: Eradicate poverty and build shared prosperity through inclusive economic transformation.

name: An integrated continent, politically united
description: A united Africa based on pan-Africanism and the ideals of the founding fathers.

name: An Africa of good governance, democracy, respect for human rights, justice and the rule of law
description: Entrench a culture of good governance, democratic values, gender equality, and respect for human rights.

name: A peaceful and secure Africa
description: Entrench a culture of peace, security, and stability as a prerequisite for development.

name: An Africa with a strong cultural identity, common heritage, shared values and ethics
description: Inculcate the spirit of Pan-Africanism and harness Africa's rich heritage and culture.

name: An Africa whose development is people-driven, relying on the potential of African people
description: Ensure active engagement of all citizens, with emphasis on women, youth, and marginalized groups.

name: Africa as a strong, united and influential global player and partner
description: Strengthen Africa's role and voice in global affairs and partnerships.
